name: drupal/tawkto
description: tawk.to Live Chat module for Drupal 8 CMS

scripts.lint:fix: phpcbf -p -s -v --standard=Drupal --extensions=php,module,inc,install,test,profile,theme,css,info,txt,md,yml --ignore=vendor/*,docker/* .; err=$?; if [ $err -eq 1 ]; then exit 0; else exit $err; fi;
scripts.package: composer run clean && mkdir -p ./tmp && cp -rt ./tmp config src vendor composer.* tawk_to.* && (cd ./tmp && zip -9 -rq ./tawk_to.zip .)
